I personally find the game fun with friends. Playing solo is kinda hard especially when you don't understand the style or competitive nature of the game. It'll take some time before really getting a feel but, for being a free game its a nice starter game.
Jedna z lepszych gierek do zabicia czasu. ;>
Unstable servers, no communications about outages. Servers go down about once every two weeks with no apparent improvements.
Sucks up your day like nothing.

I've paid for this game and I am a normal user, however I'm getting the VAC problem! What about the match surrounded by hackers? I think Valve doesn't care about your players! Sad and totally unfair. I don't recommend this kind of game and company's developer.
Comparado a versiones anteriores mejoro tanto la jugabilidad como los graficos, punto a favor, despues como punto en contra la comunidad toxica y los chiteros que siempre te encontras en una partida.

It is really only truly fun when you have friends to play with, otherwise it feels like a constant uphill battle and even though you can hard carry yourself to any rank you want you are going to hate every second of that journey up and every flaw that slaps you in the face
